## Summary

What doc change would help?

## Location

Link the page/section, or point to a file path (e.g. `README.md`, `wrkr-lua/README.md`, `docs/src/...`).

## Proposed change

What should be added/changed? If you have suggested wording, paste it here.

## Why

Who does this help and how?
